          <title>
            <string language="sv">Pluralformer 3</string>
            <string language="en">Pluralformer 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pluralformer 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pluralformer 3</string>

          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Här tränar vi på pluralformer av ord för olika klädesplagg.Modul 2 - Vad kostar det? - Grammatik 2.Safir.</string>
            <string language="en">Here, we accustom on prop shapes of words for different articles of clothing.

Module 2 - what costs it? - grammar 2.

Safir.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="sv">Safir</string>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hier gewöhnen uns wir auf Stützeformen der 
Wörter für unterschiedliche Artikel von clothing.Module 2 - welche 
Kosten es? - Grammatik 2.Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ici, nous nous accoutumons sur des formes d'appui
vertical des mots pour différents articles de clothing.Module 2 - 
quels coûts il ? - grammaire 2.Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aqui, nós acostumamo-nos em formas do suporte 
das palavras para artigos diferentes de clothing.Module 2 - que custos
ele? - gramática 2.Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui, accustom sulle figure del puntello delle 
parole per gli articoli differenti di clothing.Module 2 - che costi 
esso? - grammatica 2.Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ, εμείς accustom στις μορφές στηριγμάτων των 
λέξεων για τη διαφορετική ενότητα 2 άρθρων του ιματισμού - ποιες 
δαπάνες αυτό; - γραμματική 2.Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Aquí, nos acostumbramos en dimensiones de una 
variable del apoyo de las palabras para diversos artículos de 
clothing.Module 2 - qué costes él? - gramática 2.Safir.</string>
          </description>
